description: A package of 6 tools for Windows related to video/audio: SoundVolumeView - View/change sound levels & save/load sound level profiles on Windows Vista/7/8/2008 VideoCacheView - Play offline/Save .flv video files from Web browser cache. WebVideoCap - Capture Flash video (.flv) and RTSP/MMS streams from Video Web sites. RTMPDumpHelper - Download RTMP video/audio streams with RTMPDump toolkit. InstalledCodec - Disable/enable codec drivers and DirectShow filters. Volumouse - control the sound volume with a wheel mouse.
